title: Ophiocordyceps arborescens
text: Ophiocordyceps arborescens is an <a href="entomopathogenic%20fungus">entomopathogenic fungus</a> belonging to the order <a href="Hypocreales">Hypocreales</a> (Ascomycota) in the family <a href="Ophiocordycipitaceae">Ophiocordycipitaceae</a>. It produces superficial, oval <a href="perithecia">perithecia</a> at the apex of its <a href="stroma%20%28mycology%29">stroma</a>, and also <a href="septum">multiseptate</a> <a href="ascospore">ascospore</a>s, while producing "<a href="Hirsutella">Hirsutella</a>"-type <a href="anamorph">anamorph</a>s on growth culture media. They are particularly distinguished by the shape and size of their stroma.
